instructions: Scroll down the Setting screen and tap Safari . Scroll to the bottom of the Safari settings screen and tap Advanced . On the Advanced screen, move the slider next to JavaScript to the Off/white position.
Open the. settings. Tap on. Sound. Use the. bar. to regulate the media volume
